title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.9 - Refundability of credits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.9 - Refundability of credits

State Regulations

The tax credit established in this Part shall be refundable
as provided in article 9-A or 22 of the Tax Law. If a life sciences research
and development company fails to satisfy the eligibility criteria it will lose
the ability to claim credit for that year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
260.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
